alert.note: Alert for St. James; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 3:39PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern St. John The Baptist, southern St. James and northwestern Lafourche Parishes through 415 PM CDT... At 339 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over South Vacherie, or 12 miles northeast of Thibodaux, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Thibodaux, Gramercy, Lutcher, Wallace, South Vacherie, Chackbay, Convent and North Vacherie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: St. James; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche
